articles.title: India#39;s mineral production up 3% in December
articles.description: The index of mineral production of mining and quarrying sector at 120.3 was 2.6 per cent higher in the month under review as compared to the level in the same period of 2020, the ministry said in a statement.
articles.content:
India's mineral production rose 2.6 per cent in December 2021 over the same month a year ago, the mines ministry said on Wednesday.

articles.title: India January oilmeal export dips 65% to 1.76 lakh tonnes: SEA
articles.description: During the April-January period of the current fiscal, overall export of oilmeal fell 35 per cent to 19.43 lakh tonnes, when compared with 29.69 lakh tonnes in the year-ago period. Oilmeal is used as animal feed in poultry and other sectors.
